verses.verse: In the <S%H7969>third<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H3566>Cyrus<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6539>Persia<s%> a <S%H1697>thing<s%> was <S%H1540>revealed<s%> to <S%H1840>Daniel,<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H1095>Belteshazzar;<s%> and the <S%H1697>thing<s%> was <S%H571>true,<s%> but the time <S%H6635>appointed<s%> was <S%H1419>long:<s%> and he <S%H995>understood<s%> the <S%H1697>thing,<s%> and had <S%H998>understanding<s%> of the <S%H4758>vision.<s%>
In <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> I <S%H1840>Daniel<s%> was <S%H56>mourning<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>full<s%> <S%H7620>weeks.<s%>

I <S%H398>ate<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2530>pleasant<s%> <S%H3899>bread,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> in my <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> did I <S%H5480>anoint<s%> myself at all, <S%H5704>till<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>whole<s%> <S%H7620>weeks<s%> were <S%H4390>fulfilled.<s%>

And in the <S%H702>four<s%> and <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> as I was by the <S%H3027>side<s%> of the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5104>river,<s%> <S%H1931>which<s%> is <S%H2313>Hiddekel;<s%>

Then I <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up my <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H7200>looked,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold<s%> a <S%H259>certain<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3847>clothed<s%> in <S%H906>linen,<s%> whose <S%H4975>loins<s%> were <S%H2296>girded<s%> with fine <S%H3800>gold<s%> of <S%H210>Uphaz:<s%>

His <S%H1472>body<s%> also was like the <S%H8658>beryl,<s%> and his <S%H6440>face<s%> as the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of <S%H1300>lightning,<s%> and his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> as <S%H3940>lamps<s%> of <S%H784>fire,<s%> and his <S%H2220>arms<s%> and his <S%H4772>feet<s%> like in <S%H5869>color<s%> to <S%H7044>polished<s%> <S%H5178>brass,<s%> and the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of his <S%H1697>words<s%> like the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of a <S%H1995>multitude.<s%>

And I <S%H1840>Daniel<s%> <S%H905>alone<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H4759>vision:<s%> for the <S%H582>men<s%> that were with me <S%H7200>saw<s%> not the <S%H4759>vision;<s%> but a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2731>quaking<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> on them, so that they <S%H1272>fled<s%> to <S%H2244>hide<s%> themselves.

Therefore I was <S%H7604>left<s%> <S%H905>alone,<s%> and <S%H7200>saw<s%> this <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4759>vision,<s%> and there <S%H7604>remained<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3581>strength<s%> in me: for my <S%H1935>comeliness<s%> was <S%H2015>turned<s%> in me into <S%H4889>corruption,<s%> and I <S%H6113>retained<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3581>strength.<s%>

Yet <S%H8085>heard<s%> I the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of his <S%H1697>words:<s%> and when I <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of his <S%H1697>words,<s%> then was I in a <S%H7290>deep<s%> <S%H7290>sleep<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> my <S%H6440>face,<s%> and my <S%H6440>face<s%> toward the <S%H776>ground.<s%>
And, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> an <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5060>touched<s%> me, which <S%H5128>set<s%> me on my <S%H1290>knees<s%> and on the <S%H3709>palms<s%> of my <S%H3027>hands.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to me, O <S%H1840>Daniel,<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> greatly <S%H2530>beloved,<s%> <S%H995>understand<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> that I <S%H1696>speak<s%> to you, and <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H5977>upright:<s%> for to you am I <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H7971>sent.<s%> And when he had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>word<s%> to me, I <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H7460>trembling.<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> he to me, <S%H3372>Fear<s%> not, <S%H1840>Daniel:<s%> for from the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> that you did <S%H5414>set<s%> your <S%H3820>heart<s%> to <S%H995>understand,<s%> and to <S%H6031>chasten<s%> yourself <S%H6440>before<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> your <S%H1697>words<s%> were <S%H8085>heard,<s%> and I am <S%H935>come<s%> for your <S%H1697>words.<s%>

But the <S%H8269>prince<s%> of the <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> of <S%H6539>Persia<s%> <S%H5975>withstood<s%> me <S%H259>one<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H3117>days:<s%> but, <S%H2009>see,<s%> <S%H4317>Michael,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H7223>chief<s%> <S%H8269>princes,<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H5826>help<s%> me; and I <S%H3498>remained<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> with the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H6539>Persia.<s%>

Now I am <S%H935>come<s%> to make you <S%H995>understand<s%> <S%H853>what<s%> <S%H834><s%> shall <S%H7136>befall<s%> your <S%H5971>people<s%> in the <S%H319>latter<s%> <S%H3117>days:<s%> for <S%H5750>yet<s%> the <S%H2377>vision<s%> is for many <S%H3117>days.<s%>
And when he had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H428>such<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> to me, I <S%H5414>set<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> toward the <S%H776>ground,<s%> and I <S%H481>became<s%> <S%H481>dumb.<s%>

And, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> one like the <S%H1823>similitude<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%> <S%H5060>touched<s%> my <S%H8193>lips:<s%> then I <S%H6605>opened<s%> my <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and <S%H1696>spoke,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him that <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> me, O my <S%H113>lord,<s%> by the <S%H4758>vision<s%> my <S%H6735>sorrows<s%> are <S%H2015>turned<s%> on me, and I have <S%H6113>retained<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3581>strength.<s%>

For <S%H1963>how<s%> <S%H3201>can<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> my <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H1696>talk<s%> with <S%H2088>this<s%> my <S%H113>lord?<s%> for as for me, <S%H6258>straightway<s%> there <S%H5975>remained<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3581>strength<s%> in me, <S%H3808>neither<s%> is there <S%H5397>breath<s%> <S%H7604>left<s%> in me.
Then there came <S%H3254>again<s%> and <S%H5060>touched<s%> me one like the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of a <S%H120>man,<s%> and he <S%H2388>strengthened<s%> me,

And <S%H559>said,<s%> O <S%H376>man<s%> greatly <S%H2530>beloved,<s%> <S%H3372>fear<s%> not: <S%H7965>peace<s%> be to you, be <S%H2388>strong,<s%> yes, be <S%H2388>strong.<s%> And when he had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to me, I was <S%H2388>strengthened,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> Let my <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H1696>speak;<s%> for you have <S%H2388>strengthened<s%> me.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> he, <S%H3045>Know<s%> you <S%H4100>why<s%> I <S%H935>come<s%> to you? and <S%H6258>now<s%> will I <S%H7725>return<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> with the <S%H8269>prince<s%> of <S%H6539>Persia:<s%> and when I am <S%H3318>gone<s%> <S%H3318>forth,<s%> <S%H2009>see,<s%> the <S%H8269>prince<s%> of <S%H3120>Grecia<s%> shall <S%H935>come.<s%>

But I will <S%H5046>show<s%> you that which is <S%H7559>noted<s%> in the <S%H3791>scripture<s%> of <S%H571>truth:<s%> and there is <S%H369>none<s%> that <S%H2388>holds<s%> with me in <S%H428>these<s%> things, but <S%H4317>Michael<s%> your <S%H8269>prince.<s%>
